r.s: Simple CRUD layer for DB based models
r.d: Deneb provides a consistent CRUD interface to using Zend_Db base models and model collections, as well as segregated read and write DB pools and selectors
r.n: * Removed all trailing whitespace * Updated doc blocks * Updated Deneb_Object_Interface to include __unset(), __isset(), and get() * Fixed incorrect reference to options in Deneb_Collection_Common * Added protected fields - fields not returned by get() * Update README.md
